member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.#ctor(__m128i)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given 128-bit variable as a source. We do not recommend to use this method unless you have a clear understanding of SSE2.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Produces a zero vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.#ctor(Unigine.ivec3)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector by copying a given source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.#ctor(int,int,int)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using given integer values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.#ctor(int)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given scalar value: x=v, y=v, z=v.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.#ctor(Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given vec3 source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.#ctor(Unigine.dvec3)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given dvec3 source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.#ctor(int)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given pointer to the array of integer elements: x=v[0], y=v[1], z=v[2].
member.param: Pointer to the array of integer elements.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.#ctor(Unigine.ivec4)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given ivec4 source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.abs
member.summary: Returns the absolute values of the vector components.

member.summary: Sets the vector by components.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.set(int)
member.summary: Sets the vector using the array of integer elements: x=val[0], y=val[1], z=val[2].
member.param: Pointer to the array of integer elements.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.set(Unigine.ivec3)
member.summary: Sets the vector equal to the specified source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.set(int)
member.summary: Sets the vector components equal to specified scalar value: x=val, y=val, z=val.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec3.get
member.summary: Returns the pointer to the vector.

member.summary: Returns the constant pointer to the vector.

member.summary: Gets the vector: val[0]=x, val[1]=y, val[2]=z.
member.param: Pointer to the array of integer elements.

member.summary: Returns the squared length of the vector.
